doc_name: 18.  Attestor-MSP HHI - Waiver of Going Concern Report 2024.pdf
doc_description: This document is a formal communication from Hazel Holdings I LLC to MSP Recovery, LLC, regarding a one-time waiver of the requirement for a Going Concern Report as stipulated in a Credit Agreement. The waiver applies to the calendar year ending December 31, 2024, and outlines the conditions and limitations of this waiver.

structure.title: Introduction and Reference to Credit Agreement
structure.summary: The document begins with a reference to the Credit Agreement dated March 29, 2023, involving several parties including Hazel Holdings I LLC and MSP Recovery, LLC. It outlines the requirement for the Borrower to deliver annual financial statements and a Going Concern Report.
structure.text: Reference is made to that certain Credit Agreement dated as of March 29, 2023 (the “Credit Agreement”) by and among SUBROGATION HOLDINGS, LLC, a Delaware limited liability company (the “Borrower”), MSP RECOVERY, LLC, a Florida limited liability company (the “Owner Pledgor”), MSP RECOVERY CLAIMS, SERIES LLC – SERIES 15-09-321, a registered series of MSP Recovery Claims, Series LLC, a Delaware limited liability company, and a Subsidiary of the Borrower (the “Assignee”), Hazel Holdings I LLC, a Delaware limited liability company (“HHI Agent”) and Hazel Holdings I LLC, a Delaware limited liability company (“HHI Lender”).

structure.title: Waiver of Going Concern Report
structure.summary: The Borrower has requested a waiver for the Going Concern Report requirement for the year ending December 31, 2024. Hazel Holdings I LLC agrees to this one-time waiver, specifying that it does not affect their rights under the Credit Agreement.
structure.text: The Borrower has requested that Administrative Agent and Lender waive compliance with Section 7.2(c) of the Credit Agreement solely with respect to the Going Concern Report for the calendar year ending December 31, 2024, and any resulting Default or Event of Default therefrom. The forgoing waiver is a one-time waiver and applies only to the Going Concern Report for the calendar year ending December 31, 2024.

structure.title: Signatures
structure.summary: The document is signed by Christopher Guth, an authorized person for Hazel Holdings I LLC, both as administrative agent and lender, confirming the waiver agreement.
